content: pretty lace doily easy enough to be a first thread project but also great in other weights of yarn for mandalas rugs and more approximately 14 in diameter when made in thread my patterns are written in standard american terms and include pictures stitch guides and explanations as necessary to make them easy to follow please share your finished projects on our facebook page and join us for info coupon codes and giveaways click here to join us on facebook www facebook com/patternparadise 3 follow my blog www pattern-paradise com 4 text and images c the pattern paradise all rights reserved 3 http //facebook com/patternparadise 4 http //pattern-paradise com
